paper_abstract: A discrete static contact problem with Coulomb friction is considered. The objective is to analyze non unique solutions. Since the model depends on parameters, we explore continuation (path-following) techniques for its numerical solution. In particular, we analyse a model with one and two contact nodes. (c) 2010 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Computing non unique solutions of the Coulomb friction problem
